Reviews.Title: “A Great Place”

Reviews.Content: stayed rome marathon weekend bargain price nicely kept balcony guy front desk friendly hardly reason interact roughly id doing left people harp staff rome spend time cooked hotel moaning staff breakfast continental ones ive accross waitress friendly chatting runners noticed bad smells except sweaty runners race

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel, Below Average Staff”
Reviews.Author: Kaypo23
Reviews.Content: hotel okay clean basic special location okay staff friendliest knowledgeable didnt care bad references restaurants walking distance bad advice hoponhopoff tour didnt advantage breakfast cant comment internet slow kept kicking

Reviews.Title: “Smells Horrible, Unfriendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: Harrison B
Reviews.Content: smell coming drain bidet horrible sleep glass leave door shut everyday leave glass drain bathroom door shut everyday cleaning lady removed glass bathroom door ac window smell hot sewage permeated bed clothes constant renovation ongoing throughout 4night stay actually patching walls looked fallen worse collapsed front desk care staying friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: tut1
Reviews.Content: wasnt expect reading reviews lovely stay rome hotel clean tidy couldnt faulted breakfast cold buffet normally europe plentiful fresh id recommend hotel bled walking distance coloseum near tram metro stops else word warning check bill tourist tax 4 euros night

Reviews.Title: “We had a wonderful experience at Hotel Bled”
Reviews.Author: Sadielady1
Reviews.Content: reading negative reviews include positive loved hotel bled service outstanding rome season arrived original hotel booked told misplaced papers reservation luckily dear friends live rome hotel bled recommended actually clean beds comfortable garden location rome walk colloseum coliseum wonderful delis cafes street extra towelspillows spot experience price

Reviews.Title: “Stay away”
Reviews.Author: JKDC
Reviews.Content: simply reason stay hotel except maybe price similarly priced hotels entered smelled musty days leaving window improved bathroom smelled mildew bed extremely uncomfortable leave hotel below staff friendly particularly helpful breakfast acceptable special location terrible hotel 1520 minutes walk colloseum 5 minute walk metro stop stayed hotel else paying bad left nights paid own else bad note hotel multiple buildings explain disparity reviews

Reviews.Title: “Bad experience, Hotel is below standard”
Reviews.Author: donna54946
Reviews.Content: moved hotel nicer hotel booked stayed 2 people broken door dirty smelly bathroom bed ants bathroom ants complained move allowed stay door hotel daughter share family bled hotel smelly bathroom dirty air conditioning front staff overall hotel dumpy reccomend stay sleep train station bathrooms cleaner
